type-of-filling: 1 package (3.4 oz) instant banana cream pudding mix

step-1: combine cracker crumbs and sugar and stir in butter, leave 1/2 cup for topping. Press remainning crumbs mixture onto the sides of a greased 9-inch baking pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 5-7 min.
step-2: beat cream cheese and sugar until smooth. Arrange half of the banana slices in the crust - top with half of the cream cheese miture. repeat in layers.
step-3: Whisk mix and pudding mix for 2 min., leave minutes or until soft set, tnen pour over the cream cheese with crumb mixture. Refrigerate for 1-2 hours or until set.
